title: China allows couples third child amid demographic crisis
content:
1. China allows couples third child amid demographic crisis  Associated Press
  2. China NPC: Three-child policy formally passed into law  BBC News
  3. China passes revised law allowing couples to have up to 3 children  South China Morning Post
  4. 3rd-child policy written into Chinese law; expert projects 10% of GDP needed to raise birth rate  Global Times
  5. China eases two-child policy, encourages couples to have up to three children  Geo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
